Using a glioblastoma xenograft model in immune-deficient nude mice, we observe that glioblastoma-derived cell lines in which <e1>mir-21</e1> levels are downregulated or <e2>Pdcd4</e2> is over-expressed exhibit decreased tumor formation and growth.
